column4: I liked it preety well...but there are things that I dont like as well...there are so many settings which I don't like to mess up with...ubuntu seems more streamlined...I'll install ubuntu then download only my fave kde apps...amarok, kopete, kpdf, akregator...
am i rite in thinking kubuntu is better for lower spec PCs because I have an old laptop I wouold like to try it on
Uhm, relatively kubuntu may require higher PC spec because kde is more heavy compared to gnome or xfce...
uhm i tried xubuntu by downloading the xubuntu-desktop on top of kubuntu...xubuntu is preety like gnome...
